attributes.action: Punish the Silencing of Whilstleblowers with Extreme Severity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Organisations should be encouraged to create a culture of no fault problem reporting.  Conversely, the hushing up of problems should be treated as a crime of the greatest severity.  Punishments should be extreme.  Long jail sentences in excess of 10 year in length should be considered.
